p: After excluding 612 patients with suspected CLNM preoperatively, 364 patients were involved. Gender, age, ultrasound features and pathologic characteristics are recorded. Patients were divided into two groups by age: (I) age<45 years old; (II)ageâ‰¥45 years old. In cases of multifocal PTCs, the diameter of the largest tumor was used. ETE only accounted for microscopic extension of tumors. The diagnosis of autoimmune thyroid disease and nodule goiter was determined by general pathological examination.
